1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Ross is eyeing a beautiful woman at the counter, and Joey andNEWLINEChandler are egging him on to go talk to her. No pun intended. I mean it.

lines.Line: I'm tellin' you Ross, she wants you
She barely knows me. We just live in the same building
She lent me an egg once
She lent me an egg once
Come on, Ross, you gotta get back in the game here, ok? The RachelNEWLINEthing's not happening, your ex-wife is a lesbian—I don't think we need a third...
Excuse me, could we get an egg over here, still in the shell? Thanks
Excuse me, could we get an egg over here, still in the shell? Thanks
Yeah, you're gonna go up to her and say, Here's your egg back, I'mNEWLINEreturning your egg
She'll love it. Go with the egg, my friend

lines.Character: (Ross walks over to the woman, egg in hand
lines.Line: Ross walks over to the woman, egg in hand.

lines.Character: (Ross walks over to the woman, egg in hand
lines.Line: Ross walks over to the woman, egg in hand.
No, it's suicide. The man's got an egg

2.SceneDescription: A Restaurant, Joey and Chandler are there, waiting for their dates to show up.

lines.Line: (Looking at himself in the reflection on a knife) How do I look
Oh, uh, I... don't... care. (Joey's date shows up) Ok, now, remember,NEWLINEno trading. You get the pretty one, I get the mess
Hi, Joey. Well well, look what you brought. Very nice
Hi, Joey. Well well, look what you brought. Very nice
She's checking the coats. Joey, I'm gonna go wash the cab smell off myNEWLINEhands. Will you get me a white Zinfandel, and a glass of red for Janice

lines.Character: (Lorraine leaves. Joey shakes his head as though to say, 'It can't be the same Janice.'NEWLINEJanice enters
lines.Line: Lorraine leaves. Joey shakes his head as though to say, 'It can't be the same Janice.'NEWLINEJanice enters.

3.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, the girls are all there, discussing their bad luck withNEWLINEmen.

lines.Line: Ok, ok, Roger was creepy, but he was nothing compared to Pete Carney
Pete the Weeper? Remember that guy who used to cry every time we hadNEWLINEsex. (imitating) Was it good for you
Yeah, well, I'll take a little crying any day overNEWLINEHoward-the-I-win-guy. (imitating) I win! I win! I went out withNEWLINEthe guy for two months—I didn't get to win once
How did we end up with these jerks? We're good people
How did we end up with these jerks? We're good people
I don't know. Maybe we're some kinda magnets
I don't know. Maybe we're some kinda magnets
I know I am. That's why I can't wear a digital watch
Oh! You know my friend Abby who shaves her head? She said that if youNEWLINEwant to break the bad boyfriend cycle, you can do like a cleansing ritual
Pheebes, this woman is voluntarily bald
Pheebes, this woman is voluntarily bald
Yeah. So, we can do it tomorrow night, you guys. It's Valentine's Day.NEWLINEIt's perfect
Ok, well, what kind of ritual
Ok, well, what kind of ritual
Ok, well, what kind of ritual
Ok. We can, um, we can burn the stuff they gave us
Or...or we can chant and dance around naked, you know, with sticks
Burning's good. Yeah, I got stuff to burn

4.SceneDescription: Chandler's bedroom, Chandler wakes up, and finds someone else's hand on hisNEWLINEchest. He rolls over and is shocked to see Janice there.

5.SceneDescription: A Chinese Restaurant, Ross is there with his date.

lines.Line: I'm just sayin' if dogs do experience jet lag, then, because of the wholeNEWLINEum, seven dog years to one human year thing, then, when a dog flies from New York to LosNEWLINEAngeles, he doesn't just lose three hours, he loses like a week and a half

lines.Character: (Ross starts to laugh, and then makes a face like 'Why did I just say that?' Ross'NEWLINEex-wife, Carol, and her lesbian lover, Susan, enter the restaurant. Ross stares at them
lines.Line: Ross starts to laugh, and then makes a face like 'Why did I just say that?' Ross'NEWLINEex-wife, Carol, and her lesbian lover, Susan, enter the restaurant. Ross stares at them.
The blond woman is my ex-wife, and the woman touching her is her... close,NEWLINEpersonal friend
If you wanna put a label on it
If you wanna put a label on it
Wow, uh, anything else I should know
Wow, uh, anything else I should know

lines.Character: (Carol takes off her jacket, her pregnant belly is exposed
lines.Line: Carol takes off her jacket, her pregnant belly is exposed.
Oh, and she's pregnant with my baby. I always forget that part. (to CarolNEWLINEand Susan) Helloo

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Chandler and Joey are there. Chandler is preparing to dump JaniceNEWLINEagain.

lines.Line: How can I dump this woman on Valentine's day
I don't know. You dumped her on New Year's
I don't know. You dumped her on New Year's
Oh, man. In my next life, I'm coming back as a toilet brush
Hello, Joey, our little matchmaker. I could just kiss you all over, andNEWLINEI'm gonna

lines.Line: Janice kisses Joey all over. Chandler smiles.
(to Chandler) If you don't do it, I will

7.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, firemen are there to handle the bonfire that got out ofNEWLINEcontrol.

lines.Line: A piece of something: boxer shorts, greeting cards, and whatNEWLINElooks like a half-charred picture—Wow, that guy's hairier than the Chief
You know, it's a really funny story how this happened
You know, it's a really funny story how this happened
It's all right. It's all right. You don't have to explain. ThisNEWLINEisn't the first boyfriend bonfire that we've seen get out of control
Oh, sure, Valentine's is our busiest night of the year

8.SceneDescription: The Chinese Restaurant, Ross and Carol are talking. Kristin is not there.

lines.Line: It's not true. I never called your mother a wolverine
You did so. I swear, I swear—(noticing Kristin's absence) How longNEWLINEhas she been in the bathroom
Uh, I don't think she's in the bathroom. Her coat is gone
Uh, I don't think she's in the bathroom. Her coat is gone
Well maybe it's cold in there. Or maybe I screwed up the first date I hadNEWLINEin 9 years.
Oh, god. (He puts his head down on the grill) You know, this is stillNEWLINEpretty hot. (He picks his head up, and a mushroom sticks to his head. Carol picks it offNEWLINEand eats it.
Mushroom. Smile. They won't all be like this. Some women might even stayNEWLINEthrough dinner. Sorry, that's not funn

No, it's just...you know the whole getting on with your lifeNEWLINEthing. Well, do I have to? I mean, I'm sitting here with this cute woman, and, and, andNEWLINEshe's perfectly nice, and, but that there's, that's it. And um, and then I'm here talkin'NEWLINEto you, and, and it's easy, and it's fun, and, and I don't, I don't have to...You know,NEWLINEhere's a wacky thought. Um, what's say you and I give it another shot? No no no, I knowNEWLINEwhat you're gonna say, you're a lesbian. But what do you say we just put that aside forNEWLINEnow you know? Let's just stick a pin in it, ok? Because, we're great together, you know.NEWLINEYou can't deny it. Besides, you're carrying my baby. I mean, how perfect is that? But see,NEWLINEyou know, you keep sayin' that, but there's somethin' right here. I love you
Oh, I love you too. But..
You know that thing you put over here with the pin in it? It's time toNEWLINEtake the pin out. You'll find someone, I know you will. The right woman is just waitingNEWLINEfor you
That's easy for you to say, you found one already
That's easy for you to say, you found one already
All you need is a woman who likes men and you'll be set

lines.Line: You guys tell them you were married
